level.heading: Temporary Amendments of Section
level.text: Section 2(b) of D.C. Law 19-53, in section 8074 of D.C. Law 19-21, substituted "for tax years beginning after December 31, 2010" for "as of December 31, 2010".
Section 15(b) of D.C. Law 19-53 provides that the act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-113, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2601.
